items.title: EcoFlow’s final Xmas flash sale drops RIVER 2 Pro 768Wh power station to $299 low for 72-hours, more from $749
items.summary:
As the last addition to EcoFlow’s final Christmas Sale days, the brand has launched a 72-hour flash sale with up to 61% savings across four offers, starting with the RIVER 2 Pro Portable Power Station at $299 shipped, beating out its Amazon pricing by $16. Coming down from its $599 MSRP direct from the brand, and starting lower from $529 at Amazon, discounts kept the costs above $359 for much of the year, falling to $339 during October’s Prime Day event which ushered in further drops as low as $299. Now, through December 26, you can pick it up here with a $230 markdown off the going rate (and $300 off the MSRP) for the lowest price we have tracked. Head below to browse the full list of flash offers while they’re still around through the week.

items.summary:

Bitcoin miners that are retooling data centers for AI have boosted their stocks; the CoinShares Bitcoin Mining ETF is up ~90% YTD even as bitcoin has slumped  —  The pivot to AI has lifted a bitcoin-mining ETF by around 90% this year, even as bitcoin itself has slumped.  —  It's harder than ever to mine bitcoin.

items.title: I love my stylish MOD Easy 3 e-bike and it’s on sale alongside the SideCar models from $2,159
items.summary:
Looking back in on MOD Bikes’ Christmas e-bike sale with rare 10% sitewide savings, I wanted to shine a spotlight on my favorite ride from the brand, the gorgeous Easy 3 e-bike at $2,159 shipped, with the discount automatically applied in your cart. Normally going for $2,399 most of the time, we saw the first discounts since spring pop-up last month during Black Friday, when it fell to $2,199. If you missed out on that pricing, you’re getting an even better deal here with $240 struck from the tag. Of course, this was the brand’s original model to have sidecar attachments, with the Easy 3 SideCar e-bike at $3,509 shipped and the newer Easy SideCar Sahara also at $3,509 shipped – both down from $3,899. There’s also the new Groove SideCar 3 e-bike getting its second-ever discount to $3,149. You learn more about the Easy 3 below, as well as getting my in-depth experience in my hands-on review here.
